summary:
As I play with this mod on, I realized how important the beacon is...
so I gave the Captain a beacon, when you kill her you can get it from her corpse.

I also made the beacon a lot easier to make.
I removed the Dwemer Smithing requirement because as a mage, I don't want to waste a perk.
descriptionHtml:
You don't want to drive this Airship without a beacon, otherwise when you go out of bounds, you have to say goodbye to that neat airship you stole from the Thalmor.
That's why I edited it.

Credits to Deapri, the one who made the mod.
author: Deapri
